root.cuentas: "SELECT id,CONCAT(email_name,' <',email_from,'>') nombre FROM tbl_usuarios_c WHERE id_usuario='".intval(getParam("id_usuario"))."' AND ( email_privated='0' OR (TRIM(IFNULL(email_privated,0))='1' AND id_usuario='".current_user()."') ) ORDER BY nombre"

root.agenda: in_array(getParam("type"),array("dstart","dstop"))? make_update_query("tbl_agenda",array( "notify_".getParam("type")=>1 ),"id=(SELECT id_registro FROM tbl_registros WHERE id_aplicacion='".page2id("agenda")."' AND id_registro='".abs(intval(getParam("id")))."' AND id_usuario='".current_user()."' AND first='1')" ):""
root.emails: "SELECT CASE nombre WHEN '' THEN valor ELSE CONCAT(nombre,' <',valor,'>') END label, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(datetime)>=DATE('".current_date()."') THEN '20' WHEN DATE(datetime)>=DATE('".current_date(-86400*7)."') THEN '10' WHEN DATE(datetime)>=DATE('".current_date(-86400*30)."') THEN '5' ELSE '1' END) score FROM tbl_correo_a a LEFT JOIN tbl_correo b ON a.id_correo=b.id AND id_cuenta IN (SELECT id FROM tbl_usuarios_c WHERE id_usuario='".current_user()."') AND state_spam='0' WHERE b.id IS NOT NULL AND id_tipo IN (1,2,3,4) AND (".make_like_query("nombre,valor",getParam("term")).") GROUP BY label ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 25"

root.feed2bookmark: "SELECT link FROM tbl_feeds WHERE id=( SELECT id_registro FROM tbl_registros WHERE id_aplicacion='".page2id("feeds")."' AND id_registro='".abs(intval(getParam("id")))."' AND id_usuario='".current_user()."' AND first='1' )"
root.textos: "SELECT descripcion texto FROM tbl_textos a LEFT JOIN tbl_registros e ON e.id_aplicacion='".page2id("textos")."' AND e.id_registro=a.id AND e.first=1 LEFT JOIN tbl_usuarios d ON e.id_usuario=d.id WHERE a.id='".intval(getParam("id"))."' AND (publico='1' OR ".check_sql("textos","list").")"
